resources.string: A popular short coffee drink. Expresso is the basis for the coffee menu
Americano is an espresso with boiling water. The same amount of delicious coffee, but more water
Raf coffee base on espresso with steamed milk foam and mild vanilla flavor
Espresso is mixed with steamed milk and topped with foam
Classic latte with the dried flowers of lavender and lavender syrup
A cappuccino is an Italian coffee drink. Traditionally it made with espresso and steamed milk foam
Drink from Australia with bright coffee taste: steamed milk covers the strong coffee
Cacao is milk steamed with natural cacao powder
A thick chocolate drink based on milk
Coffee-juice is an interesting mix of flavored espresso and warm juice
